segment.target: One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
One cannot be entirely sure what it is exactly, but there's one way to find out. Swallow it!
A nice, ripe banana is perfect for those times when you're a bit peckish
A nice, ripe banana is perfect for those times when you're a bit peckish
The Creepnut is a fruit laden with flavours including squid, curry and coconut milk...
The Creepnut is a fruit laden with flavours including squid, curry and coconut milk...
The Meztine is a delicate, sweet fruit. Its collagen-like pulp is used to make a form of tobacco in some parts of Southern France.
The Meztine is a delicate, sweet fruit. Its collagen-like pulp is used to make a form of tobacco in some parts of Southern France.
The Guntiflop is a pretty unattractive thing, but some people will accept no substitute.
The Guntiflop is a pretty unattractive thing, but some people will accept no substitute.
The Ploshmina is mainly used as a toy for children because it is a nightmare to eat and makes a funny noise when turned.
The Ploshmina is mainly used as a toy for children because it is a nightmare to eat and makes a funny noise when turned.
The Precati is a species of courgette which is incredibly difficult to chew because of its elastic consistency moments ago.
The Precati is a species of courgette which is incredibly difficult to chew because of its elastic consistency moments ago.
The fruit of the Buttalien is attractive, but its flavour leaves a lot to be desired.
The fruit of the Buttalien is attractive, but its flavour leaves a lot to be desired.
The Fragilane is a small, tasty fruit of minimal nutritional value.
The Fragilane is a small, tasty fruit of minimal nutritional value
The anemole is a fruit which, when fresh, can be used to create a butter which can be used as an alternative to normal cooking butter.
The anemole is a fruit which, when fresh, can be used to create a butter which can be used as an alternative to normal cooking butter.
The kubinus is much-loved by a sect of twisted mathematicians who are fanatical about perfect shapes and square flavours.
The kubinus is much-loved by a sect of twisted mathematicians who are fanatical about perfect shapes and square flavours.
The Caleboot can be immediately recognized by its brutal aromas and punchy flavours.
The Caleboot can be immediately recognized by its brutal aromas and punchy flavours. Reply
The iTrackie®© represents arguably the finest in digital gadgetry. It looks good, it's elegant, subtle, it vibrates, and almost never breaks down.
The Technician's best friend. Significantly boosts repair skills.
The Technician's best friend. Significantly boosts repair skills. An adjustable wrench which can be used for repairing valves, turrets... and everything repairable.
Initially designed for beer-loving aliens, this state of the art tool has unexpected applications when it comes to fixing the Daedalus. Increases chances of successful repairs by 50%

Initially designed for beer-loving aliens, this state of the art tool has unexpected applications when it comes to fixing the Daedalus. Increases chances of successful repairs by 50% Thanks to its fabulous liquid ceramic coating, this awesome object will save your life. It will allow you to open cans effortlessly, stomachs, pipes, pistons, walls, dividing walls, eyes, armor, reinforced windows, mattress frames, uncooperative humans, heavy plating... all for the modest sum of... nothing at all.

It's pretty shaky and makes a racket going along the corridors, but it does allow you to get from one end of the Daedalus to the other without getting tired. On every even cycle, you earn extra 1 :pm: during :pa:-:pm: conversion.

It's pretty shaky and makes a racket going along the corridors, but it does allow you to get from one end of the Daedalus to the other without getting tired. On every even cycle, you earn extra 1 :pm: during :pa:-:pm: conversion.
If the force isn't with you, you need to find something to help you aim.
These lenses help you to see better +10% for all shooting actions.

These lenses help you to see better +10% for all shooting actions.
These ultra-sophisticated lenses were developed using advanced feline technology, and make you a more efficient predator.
A superb, state of the art, oscilloscope Doubles success rate when repairing Patrol Craft or the Daedalus' hull.

A superb, state of the art, oscilloscope Doubles success rate when repairing Patrol Craft or the Daedalus' hull.
You never really understood the point of an oscilloscope but in any case, nobody gives a toss... apart from patrol craft pilots.
This armor is recommended on expeditions Onboard: Absorbs 1 point of combat damage.

This armor is recommended on expeditions Onboard: Absorbs 1 point of combat damage.
Plastenite armor is made from bio-sensitive latex and highly flexible materials, which make it light, comfortable, and almost invisible. Some find it a little effeminate and compare it to a military version of Spanx control pants. We're guessing that the moulded breastplate doesn't help. Truth is though, you're better off looking ridiculous than dead.
When carrying out repairs, your chances of getting injured are divided by 5.
When carrying out repairs, your chances of getting injured are divided by 5. Losing a hand doesn't make for a good day.
You'll never get dirty again when doing your dirty deeds.
You'll never get dirty again when doing your dirty deeds. An old, tired-looking apron bearing the message: "Best engineer of my heart". Nobody knows who brought it, but it is useful...
An old bar of Ethereal Nether. It'll be there in your shower of need. Washing yourself costs 1AP less.
An old bar of Ethereal Nether. It'll be there in your shower of need. Washing yourself costs 1AP less. Some people should really get involved with this stuff.
Super Soaper is a revolutionary product in the fight against mush. Washing yourself costs 1AP less AND removes a spore!
Super Soaper is a revolutionary product in the fight against mush. Washing yourself costs 1AP less AND removes a spore! The future of humanity will either be clean or it will not be.
A universal translation module *Expedition : 2x Chance of finding artefacts in a sector containing "Intelligent Life"*

A universal translation module Expedition : 2x Chance of finding artefacts in a sector containing "Intelligent Life" The Babel module was updated several years ago by a fish farmer. He had had enough of seeing his goldfish die so quickly so he decided to finance a project seeking to allow him to communicate with them. The module decodes the emotions linked to pre- and sub-conscious Alpha and Beta waves and transforms them into intelligible words... more or less. This hit him really hard, because his fish just turned out to be idiots with no intellect to speak of whatsoever. However, enabling himself to communicate with any and all life forms made him millions when he sold his invention to dog owners... Cats never deigned to speak to humans. After the first encounters with xenomorphs occurred, he became extremely rich <delete> and had many children</delete>.
The drill lets you recover minerals on expeditions Expedition : Doubles the gain from "Hydrocarbon" events.

The drill lets you recover minerals on expeditions Expedition : Doubles the gain from "Hydrocarbon" events
The drill allows expedition members to get through situations which are on the hard side.
The Echo-locator is useful for exploratory missions. It allows its user to detect movement in their immediate surroundings. Expedition : 5x Chance of discovering a remaining "Hydrocarbon" sector.

The Echo-locator is useful for exploratory missions. It allows its user to detect movement in their immediate surroundings. Expedition : 5x Chance of discovering a remaining "Hydrocarbon" sector.
The Echo-Locator is a powerful tool for expedition troops in hostile areas. Unfortunately everything that moves isn't dangerous. And vice versa.
The quadrimetric compass is most useful on missions Expedition : Protects the group from "Wandering" events. Expedition : Prevents you from getting "lost"

The quadrimetric compass is most useful on missions Expedition : Protects the group from "Wandering" events. Expedition : Prevents you from getting "lost"
The quadrimetric compass means you can find yourself if you get lost on an expedition, it is an invaluable tool for anyone venturing into hostile territory.

On expeditions, the rope allows you to get out of an dead-end. Expedition : Removes possibility of personal damage which could happen in "Seismic", "Grotto" and "Mountain" areas, but does not prevent sudden deaths.

On expeditions, the rope allows you to get out of an dead-end. Expedition : Removes possibility of personal damage which could happen in "Seismic", "Grotto" and "Mountain" areas, but does not prevent sudden deaths.
Looking at the probability statistics of what one would conceivably find aboard the Daedalus, the rope got zero. However...
Facilitates exploration by detecting nearby heat signatures Expedition : 5x Chance of finding a remaining "Ruminant","Predator","Intelligent life","Mankarog", or "Insect" sector.

Facilitates exploration by detecting nearby heat signatures Expedition : 5x Chance of finding a remaining "Ruminant","Predator","Intelligent life","Mankarog", or "Insect" sector. Paradoxically, interplanetary expeditions can sometimes prove to be extremely hazardous to your vital signs. The heat detector allows you to know ahead of time the size and intensity of any heat signal in the immediate surroundings. Unfortunately, the aggression levels of certain xenomorphs doesn't appear to be proportional to their body heat. In the event of contact with a xenomorph, some sort of light weapon could prove useful.
The white flag is a universal symbol of peace. Well, more or less... Expedition: Removes the possibility of combat occurring in a sector containing "Intelligent Life"

The white flag is a universal symbol of peace. Well, more or less... Expedition: Removes the possibility of combat occurring in a sector containing "Intelligent Life" In 2030, the UN declared the white flag the international symbol of peoples wishing to negociate, which meant this signal came into widespread usage as a means to say, "we come in peace". Following some trivial complications in the beginning, reports of falsely declared white flags resulting in murdered dignitaries, its range is still highly limited and the good faith of an expedition team alone is often insufficient to guarantee access to diplomatic facilities.
This little gadged can project life-size showings of alien TV series in the Refectory! A great way to boost crew morale! Unique: Allows every viewer to gain +3 :pmo:

This little gadged can project life-size showings of alien TV series in the Refectory! A great way to boost crew morale! Unique: Allows every viewer to gain +3 :pmo: The hypnotic effect of this machine makes you forget your worries. And your strife. And... what's your name again?
A slab of these frustrating little notes.
As they say, if you can't fix it with duct tape, you're not using enough.
As they say, if you can't fix it with duct tape, you're not using enough. This roll of adhesive tape has many uses, some of which shouldn't be admitted to...
The extinguisher is the best friend of the crewmember trapped by fire.
The extinguisher is the best friend of the crewmember trapped by fire. The extinguisher is a standard-sized safety device designed to put out fires.
The hacker kit allows you to unblock access to protected modules such as the Command Terminal or NERON's bios.

The hacker kit allows you to unblock access to protected modules such as the Command Terminal or NERON's bios. The hacker kit is a strange object whose usefulness remains to be seen and in all truth, very few people know what it's even used for...
MAD Kubes are a family of objects designed solely to crush the spirit.
MAD Kubes are a family of objects designed solely to crush the spirit. The MAD Kube, none can resist. Very few succeed in solving it in under 26 moves.
The microwave allows crewmembers to cook food quickly and efficiently. However, we can't be entirely sure how safe it is.
The microwave allows crewmembers to cook food quickly and efficiently. However, we can't be entirely sure how safe it is. A modern piece of equipment used to cook rations quickly.
The superfreezer allows crewmembers to sterilize and repackage food.
The superfreezer allows crewmembers to sterilize and repackage food. A modern piece of equipment used to store food often for long periods.
The tabulatrix allows NERON to provide you with written documents.

The tabulatrix allows NERON to provide you with written documents. Stripped straight out of the minds of the greatest science fiction writers, a quasi-autonomous machine which can print symbols on paper when perforated cards are inserted. Certain encrypted signals can only be decoded using this prehistoric machine.
An old T-Shirt totally covered in crap.
An old T-Shirt totally covered in crap. Disgusting. You should burn it.
More worthless debris. With a few tools and a little patience, it's astounding what you can do...
A cold, hollow tube A thick tube... what could this be for ?
Schrödinger is a pretty grumpy, but undeniably silky, cat.
Schrödinger is a pretty grumpy, but undeniably silky, cat. "A lovely cat, so soft and poised. When it miaows, it can hardly be heard, As its timbre is so soft and discreet." This is Raluca's cat.

The best friend of the man-about-ship, this drone can carry out many tasks in your place
The Drone carries out actions similar to those of the crew.
Try to repair the defective equipment in the room before you leave.

The best friend of the man-about-ship, this drone can carry out many tasks in your place. The Drone carries out actions similar to those of the crew. Try to repair the defective equipment in the room before you leave. The support drone fulfils the automatic maintenance objective planned for the Magellan project. Employing the Beta-Slave protocol it is almost possible to replace a human being. Aside from the minor issue of building the thing...

This fan-bloody-tastic oil is not content just to heal your injuries, it can also be used to fuel the Daedalus reactor! Heals 100% of injuries. Can be inserted into a reservoir to gain 5 fuel units. Not entirely fluid, not entirely solid, its viscosity has no equal save its powerful odor.
Used for first aid, and more besides...
Used for first aid, and more besides... In space, the first space leech that rocks onto the scene can do serious damage. Take one of these for the trip!
This little survival miracle is unparalleled for on-the-go healing. If the user is one of the medical team, they'll get a bonus.
The Retro-Fungal Serum can eradicate all traces of Mush in the nervous system of vertebrates.

The Retro-Fungal Serum can eradicate all traces of Mush in the nervous system of vertebrates. The retro-fungal serum is designed to eliminate the parthenogenesis mechanism in the B-strain of the Mush virus, and in doing so, give the host's body a chance to reject spores and therefore avoid further contamination.
Applied to the most intimate parts of NERON's nexus, it allows lab research calculations to be carried out 15% more quickly. When found in the Nexus, the jelly increases your research efforts by 3%

Applied to the most intimate parts of NERON's nexus, it allows lab research calculations to be carried out 15% more quickly. When found in the Nexus, the jelly increases your research efforts by 3% We coul have used this in the kitchen but the chef wasn't keen...

Incredible! This peaceful tubular alien crustacean has exactly the same diameter as the Tesla Shells in the Daedalus turrets! +100% damage for the turret where it is placed. If it is destroyed, this will cause a fire in the room

A beautiful map which clearly displays all the info you might need on any of the planets in the Magellan system. When this is on ther Bridge, the Liquid Map will reveal one or two sectors of a discovered planet

A beautiful map which clearly displays all the info you might need on any of the planets in the Magellan system. When this is on the Bridge, the Liquid Map will reveal one or two sectors of a discovered planet You get the feeling that this thing is trying to speak to you. You must be dreaming.
The camera is an extremely useful tool for --spying-- observing your neighbors. In the presence of a camera, *secret* and *covert* actions are revealed.

The camera is an extremely useful tool for --spying-- observing your neighbors. In the presence of a camera, **secret** and **covert** actions are revealed. When a camera is installed in a room, all logs are saved in the history and displayed publicly. The camera also logs covert and furtive activity. It doesn't work if it is in your personal inventory.
The cutting edge of Mush research finally catalogued on one disk
The cutting edge of Mush research finally catalogued on one disk. This disk contains the decrypted Mush genome. As it stands, it isn't of much use to you, not even as a weapon.
This sample could be used to advance Science!

This sample could be used to advance Science ! An adult Mush dendrite, in fact it is a pseudo-nerve-ending created by the Mush in it's adult state. It is an incredible conductor of electricity and tastes of nuts.
The Myco goes off when a Mush tries to get in on the action.
The Myco goes off when a Mush tries to get in on the action. The myco-alarm detects high concentrations of mycotoxine. If the Mush decides to attack, the alarm will sound.
A shard of the starmap which one day might lead you to New Eden.
A shard of the starmap which one day might lead you to New Eden. The extra-terrestrials that left this must have used it for something... Maybe by analyzing it you can learn more about them...
This allows you to keep hydrated in any situation, but nobody has done the necessary research into where it should be inserted...

This allows you to keep hydrated in any situation, but nobody has done the necessary research into where it should be inserted... Who decided to bring this thing on board... It reminds you of the nonsense tourist artefacts you get on Venus..

The machine gun in an extremely heavy weapon. Certain international laws prohibit its use against humans. When you see it, you'll know why. Some call it 'Old painless' but that depends which end you're at... Expedition: + 2 added to the strength of your team during combats.

The machine gun is an extremely heavy weapon. Certain international laws prohibit its use against humans. When you see it, you'll know why. Some call it 'Old painless' but that depends which end you're at...
Expedition: + 2 added to the strength of your team during combats.
The F.R.A.K.U. automatic assault rifle, is better known as the "lead spitter". It's rate of fire, range, weight, modified payload... in short it's an impressive piece of kit. Heavy? Yeah. Dangerous? Hell yeah. It kicks ass.
The ultimate in precision rifles Expedition: +1 added to the strength of your team during combats.

The ultimate in precision rifles Expedition: +1 added to the strength of your team during combats. Since time immemorial, the solo shooter and his weapon have been a cornerstone of the armed forces. The Lizaro Jungle sniper rifle was created by rebel factions, it's fairly expensive and can be used in rain, hail or snow. Its semi-automatic loading mechanism gives it a deadly rate of fire. To be used with extreme caution.
The knife is a weapon, which although a little dated, still has plenty of fans. Expedition: + 1 added to the strength of your team during combats.
The knife is a weapon, which although a little dated, still has plenty of fans. Expedition: + 1 added to the strength of your team during combats. 20 cm of psychopathic joy
The standard-issue sidearm of security forces Expedition: + 1 added to the strength of your team during combats.

The standard-issue sidearm of security forces Expedition: + 1 added to the strength of your team during combats.
Its concentrated energy beam makes this a handy weapon. The latest model from DisHotBuzz allows you to effortlessly and elegantly defend yourself against all kinds of danger.
The Natamy Rifle is an anti-Mush assault rifle. Expedition: +1 added to the strength of your team in the event of combat.

The Natamy Rifle is an anti-Mush assault rifle. Expedition: +1 added to the strength of your team in the event of combat. A very special rifle developed by the crew. Its shells contain bicarbonate of soda and retro-patuline which have anti-fungal properties.
The grenade will get you out of many difficult expedition situations... Expedition : +3 to the strength of your team in the event of combat.
The grenade will get you out of many difficult expedition situations... Expedition : +3 to the strength of your team in the event of combat. Upon it is written: "Make your potential explode".
Highly sophisticated weapon for those who aren't. Expedition: + 3 added to the strength of your team during combats.

Highly sophisticated weapon for those who aren't. Expedition: + 3 added to the strength of your team during combats. The rocket launcher has long been an integral part of of the arsenal of expedition troops in hostile areas. The technology hasn't changed in hundreds of years. It has a particular cult, almost fetish-item, status amongst those who wield it...
Contains drugs and bandages Contains $herog_numb x Bandage Contains $herog_numb x Drugs This is an object that can be **shared** (:group:).
Contains drugs and bandages Contains $herog_numb x Bandage Contains $herog_numb x Drugs The archetypal interstellar object which is always stored where it shouldn't be. Or in your pockets.
The Fuel Capsule is used to transfer fuel from the fuel tank to the ship's engines. Contains 1 unit of fuel.
The Fuel Capsule is used to transfer fuel from the fuel tank to the ship's engines. Contains 1 unit of fuel. Can be filled with fuel in order to transfer it to the combustion chamber.
The HydroPot allows you to plant a fruit and thus develop the garden.
The HydroPot allows you to plant a fruit and thus develop the garden. A place to put a plant in the hydroponic garden.
Rations! A joy to share. Contains $herog_numb x Standard Ration.
Rations! A joy to share. Contains $herog_numb x Standard Ration. The galactic equivalent of hot soup when you're getting spanked by absolute zero conditions.
The oxygen capsule contains a standard measure of oxygen. It can be reintroduced to the system via the reservoirs in the storage bays.

The oxygen capsule contains a standard measure of oxygen. It can be reintroduced to the system via the reservoirs in the storage bays. The OxyTron capsule by AirGaz Inc. Allows oxygen to be moved in a liquid state. As luck would have it, its protective film is almost unbreakable.
The Space Capsule must contain something you really need. And its soooo gooood...
The Space Capsule must contain something you really need. And its soooo gooood... A capsule contains something. The only way to find out what it is, is to open it. Are you ready for a surprise?
A superb sofa in hand-stitched Nubuck leather. Designed in Sweden but produced cheaply on Enceladus.
A superb sofa in hand-stitched Nubuck leather. Designed in Sweden but produced cheaply on Enceladus. Who would have thought that a plywood structure and a few cushions could be so relaxing...
There is nothing quite like a hot cup of joe... Contains $herog_numb x Coffee.
There's nothing quite like a hot cup of joe... Contains 4 x Coffee The final word in solidarity in times of famine. Delivered without hot soup and without brazier.
The banana plant is herbaceous and produces nutritious, tasty fruits.
The banana plant is herbaceous and produces nutritious, tasty fruits. If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Bananas.
The creepist is a strangely twisted tree.
The creepist is a strangely twisted tree. If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Creepnuts.
Originally from the great deserts of Tantris, the cactax is used in sacred ceremonial rituals...
Originally from the great deserts of Tantris, the cactax is used in sacred ceremonial rituals... If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Metzines.
A true curiosity of nature, the Bifflon is a talking tree...that spends his time reciting Keats...which makes his company depressing.
A true curiosity of nature, the Bifflon is a talking tree...that spends his time reciting Keats...which makes his company depressing.
The Pulminagro is a tree resulting from the cross-breeding of a palm tree and a kind of alien sphagnum. It has an unusual characteristic which allows it to grow in dimly lit places[...]
The Pulminagro is a tree resulting from the cross-breeding of a palm tree and a kind of alien sphagnum. It has an unusual characteristic which allows it to grow in dimly lit places[...]
This strange tree produces a type of incredibly dirty and completely useless alien rubber....
This strange tree produces a type of incredibly dirty and completely useless alien rubber.... If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Precatis.
The Buttalien is an amusing tree, its spiky fruits reflect light strangely.
The Buttalien is an amusing tree, its spiky fruits reflect light strangely. If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Bottines.
The Platacia is an allergic savannah tree with no true interest. Allows to accommodate a plant of the hydroponic garden.
The Platacia is an allergic savannah tree with no true interest. Allows to accommodate a plant of the hydroponic garden.
The latest fashion in Venusian tree farming is to grow your own Tubiliscus. The fruits they produce, however, have multiple, varied uses.

The latest fashion in Venusian tree farming is to grow your own Tubiliscus. The fruits they produce, however, have multiple, varied uses. If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Anemoles.
The Graapshoot is a stylish, elegant tree. Its leaves give off a coppery smell.
The Graapshoot is a stylish, elegant tree. Its leaves give off a coppery smell. A place to put a plant in the hydroponic garden.
The Peniraft is a fruit which is very much in vogue on Venicia. Its mediocre culinary interest has been sustained thanks to this hype.
The Peniraft is a fruit which is very much in vogue on Venicia. Its mediocre culinary interest has been sustained thanks to this hype.
The Mycopia has an intriguing shape. Some of its characteristics are not that dissimilar to those of a certain famous fungus...

The Mycopia has an intriguing shape. Some of its characteristics are not that dissimilar to those of a certain famous fungus... If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Caleboots.
The Asperagunk is pretty similar to the Terran Asparagus, but bigger. Allows to accomodate a plant of the hydroponic garden.
The Asperagunk is pretty similar to the Terran Asparagus, but bigger. Allows to accomodate a plant of the hydroponic garden
The Filandra is by far the most painful fruit to eat...
The Filandra is by far the most painful fruit to eat...
The Bumpjunkin is an extra-terrestrial plant, although rumours suggest it's originally from South America. It just goes to show...

The Bumpjunkin is an extra-terrestrial plant, although rumours suggest it's originally from South America. It just goes to show... If you take care of this plant it will repay you with Oxygen and delicious Jumpkins.
The Jumpkin is a fruit of no real gastronomic interest, however, it has some highly original properties.
The Jumpkin is a fruit of no real gastronomic interest, however, it has some highly original properties.
A curious mix of caterpillars and other worms shaped into a bar and shrinkwrapped in plastic. Gulp...
A curious mix of caterpillars and other worms shaped into a bar and shrinkwrapped in plastic. Gulp...
This is disgusting, it smells like a Xylophid which has been dead for 2 months and has been buried in a cheddar vat one sunny afternoon.
This is disgusting, it smells like a Xylophid which has been dead for 2 months and has been buried in a cheddar vat one sunny afternoon.

The scourge of the mechanic. These grains have to be stored in an airtight environment, otherwise they'll escape and find their way into automatic doors. +10 :pa: Non-perishable +5 satisfaction 55% chance of damaging a door aboard the Daedalus
The scourge of the mechanic. These grains have to be stored in an airtight environment, otherwise they'll escape and find their way into automatic doors.
Since arriving on the Magellan nebula, the only way we've been able to interact with alien life forms has been by eating them.
Since arriving on the Magellan nebula, the only way we've been able to interact with alien life forms has been by eating them.
These little cubes of wriggling testosterone should be consumed in moderation
These little cubes of wriggling testosterone should be consumed in moderation
The fundamental fuel for all daedalus crewmembers
The fundamental fuel for all daedalus crewmembers
Hot protein-enriched molasses sculpted into the form of traditional terrestrial meals. It tastes pretty much the same, but with a little imagination, we can work wonders.
Hot protein-enriched molasses sculpted into the form of traditional terrestrial meals. It tastes pretty much the same, but with a little imagination, we can work wonders.
Space potato chips! Strange thing is that guys love them, but the women of the crew have forbidden them in the refectory. Apparently they smell of socks and are too stodgy...
Space potato chips! Strange thing is that guys love them, but the women of the crew have forbidden them in the refectory. Apparently they smell of socks and are too stodgy...

A portion of protein-enriched molasses agglomerate in a galactic long-life tray. These rations are scientifically designed to be easy to digest via the traditional route, but can also be injected intraveinously.

A portion of protein-enriched molasses agglomerate in a galactic long-life tray. These rations are scientifically designed to be easy to digest via the traditional route, but can also be injected intraveinously.
The most fashionable SNC product, which in certain South American tribes, has completely replaced Ayahuasca. Only contains substances scientifically proven to be bad for your health!

You can resist. You can resist... Oh but no! You just couldn't say no to a SuperVitamin Bar. It's soooo gooooood...
The most fashionable SNC product, which in certain South American tribes, has completely replaced Ayahuasca. Only contains substances scientifically proven to be bad for your health!
Blueprints are a godsend for those who suck at construction games.
Books. A practical, if antiquated invention. Maybe you'll find the solutions to your life's problems within. In any case, reading won't do you any harm.
Documents can be read. I wonder what is in them...
Documents can be read. I wonder what is in them... Curiosity is indeed a dangerous thing... This is a document could be secret, worthless, or invaluable. Who knows what it contains...
Books. A practical, if antiquated invention. Maybe you'll find the solutions to your life's problems within. In any case, reading won't do you any harm.

Books. A practical, if antiquated invention. Maybe you'll find the solutions to your life's problems within. In any case, reading won't do you any harm. A stack of cellulose with which it might be able to knock Raluca out, and more besides...
Books. A practical, if antiquated invention. Maybe you'll find the solutions to your life's problems within. In any case, reading won't do you any harm.

Books. A practical, if antiquated invention. Maybe you'll find the solutions to your life's problems within. In any case, reading won't do you any harm. A stack of cellulose with which it might be able to knock Raluca out, and more besides...
A slightly-sticky post-it note.… These wretched little notelets are all over the camp... Who really needs this crap?
